Text.Language: Wouniatk qen oumeym/i: peniwt eyouab n~dikeoc: abba Teji yeo~vanioc: pimenrit n~te Pi,~rictoc.
Blessed are you indeed / our holy righteous father / Abba Teji the Beholder of God / the beloved of Christ.
